text: A few months late here: but a reason why I think altrep has so much potential is mainly for FFI and notably altlist. Right now there is no good way to create a vector of foreign structs. The way that this gets done is by creating a list of externalptr which is pretty inefficient. With an Altlist altrep we can create just a single pointer to a foreign struct that can have a it’s own vector / storage mechanism and doesn’t have to deserialize/serialize each pointer
